channel.title: Half-Life Web Series needs support
channel.description:
Hello
Calling all fans of Half-Life.
We are crowdfunding the second part of our Half-Life web series titled The Freeman Chronicles.
All I as is that you share the campaign, say on Facebook.
[url]https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/half-life/half-life-live-action-film-the-freeman-chronicles[/url]
Thanks in advance and for your trouble here's a nice wallpaper.
![](upload://9n7jyTOChbH54WDq7n6jkvHrpY1.jpeg)

item.title: Half-Life Web Series needs support
item.dc:creator: MaxTheLimit
item.description:
Congrats on meeting your kickstarter goals!
I look forward to the results of the generous funding of the HL community.

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life Web Series needs support
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
Right, I’ve deleted out one post and handed out an infraction. If you’re not interested in this film, leave it alone. If you are and want to post CONSTRUCTIVE criticism (and a lot of you are) then go ahead, I’m sure they’ll appreciate it. It is NOT fair to abuse the OP just because you don’t like fan films and/or Kickstarters.

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life Web Series needs support
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Cheerios4606:

Oh I am sure they will hear you out. And judging by the oh so warm welcome we have seen in this thread, I am sure they will think again before coming here to let us know the project has been released.

Example:

Bots come to shit post advertize and nobody gives a shit. A person makes a gimmick account to post a few times begging for money for the project they want to make and its a big deal when I’m down on them.

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life Web Series needs support
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Of the reactions in the thread, over half are in support. That’s a win for them, in my opinion.

They probably only came to spread the word for their funding, anyway. This community isn’t exactly expansive.

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life Web Series needs support
item.dc:creator: Cheerios
item.description:
Oh I am sure they will hear you out. And judging by the oh so warm welcome we have seen in this thread, I am sure they will think again before coming here to let us know the project has been released.

Example:

SURPLUS_NiNjA:

Too many of these things exist and I find uninteresting for me to give a shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life Web Series needs support
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
They’re asking for financial support, the least they could do is hear us out when we ask for metal to not glare in the dark.

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life Web Series needs support
item.dc:creator: Cheerios
item.description:
wow. what a bunch of debbie downers you guys are. I say more power to ya!

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life Web Series needs support
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
You guys’ work is great, but I gotta agree that many of the screen effects are far overdone. Just tone some of it down and you have all the support I can get.

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life Web Series needs support
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
Shaky cams that are well done actually add a lot to the dynamics and intensity of a fight.

Without a shaky cam, every fight would look like this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XJ-ATwRq5KY

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life Web Series needs support
item.dc:creator: MrSnaztastic
item.description:
Has real potential. I just hope they don’t go crazy with all the stylization again, with overdone colour correction, lens flares everywhere…

And if we can have a fight scene or two without shakycam that’d be swell

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life Web Series needs support
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Too many of these things exist and I find uninteresting for me to give a shit.

Read full topic

Hello

Calling all fans of Half-Life.

We are crowdfunding the second part of our Half-Life web series titled The Freeman Chronicles.

All I as is that you share the campaign, say on Facebook.
